judgment_text:
In the High Court of Punjab and Haryana, Chandigarh.
C.W.P. No.960 of 1997
Date of Decision: 12.12.2007
Paramjit Singh and Others

  Petitioners
Versus
State of Punajb and Others.

  Respondents
CORAM: HON BLE MR.JUSTICE RAJESH BINDAL
Present:
Mr. K.G.Chaudhary, Advocate
for the petitioners.
Mr. Mr.Parveen Chander Goyal, 
Senior Deputy Advocate General, Punjab
for the respondents.
RAJESH BINDAL, J.

Learned counsel for the petitioner fairly states that the issue raised
in the present petition is squarely covered by C.W.P. No. 18012 of 1997
(Rajinder Singh and Others v. State of Punjab and Others), which has
been decided by judgment of this Court today.
Accordingly, for the reasons stated in the aforementioned writ
petition, the present writ petition is disposed of.

 (Rajesh Bindal)

 Judge
December 12, 2007

 DK
